answers.answer: Hope all goes well. I'll keep you and lil man in my prayers. I'm also 33 weeks 5 days pregnant with a boy. And my doctor wants to induce me at 37 weeks. Because my baby is growing too fast and is real big.  But I have faith that everything will go well with you and baby.
thank you so much, you and your lil man will be in my prayers as well honey,

Wow I'm also 30weeks and 2days I can't imagine :( I'm praying for you and baby! I can't afford for anything to go wrong with me, I have a hubby whose been sick with congestive heart failure and my 13yr old with autism so needless to say I'm trying to take care of and keep up with an entire household!

Bless your heart, your already dealin with enough. I know it's not the end of the world but it feels like it. Tryna stay strong for me and my child but it gets hard. It's nice to talk to other expecting mothers.

question: I'm currently in the hospital right now until i deliever because of my high blood pressure! It gets to me because being here is so depressing but i know its for the best for me and my son. My doctors are planning to induce me within several weeks due to the fact i have a mild case of PREECLAMPSIA and the only cure is to deliever.
title: 30 weeks and two days!!!!
